sqlReaderQuery.value:
select
p.[pipeline_name_nk] as [pipeline_name],
e.[entity_name],
ba.[activity_nk] as [batch_activity],
[category_nk] as [error_category],
[error_message]
	from [dbo].[exception] ex
	join [dbo].[error_category] erc on erc.[error_category_id] = ex.[error_category_id]
	left join [dbo].[batch] b on ex.[batch_id] = b.[batch_id]
	left join [dbo].[entity] e on e.[entity_id] = b.[entity_id]
	left join [dbo].[batch_execution_status] bs on bs.[status_id] = b.[status_id]
	left join [dbo].[batch_activity] ba on ba.activity_id = b.activity_id
	left join [dbo].[pipeline_log] lex on lex.[run_id] = ex.[run_id]
	left join [dbo].[pipeline] p on p.[pipeline_id] = lex.[pipeline_id]
	where lex.[parent_run_id] = '@{pipeline().parameters.parent_run_id}'
order by [error_timestamp]
